Policies and Initiatives.title: Before the first missiles fly: AI, cyber & electronic warfare - how India is preparing for invisible battlefields
Policies and Initiatives.summary: India is integrating AI, cyber, and electronic warfare into its military, adopting a process-centric doctrine over a platform-centric one. This shift, as seen in Operation Sindoor, aims to enhance intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance capabilities. The goal is to achieve strategic dominance and reduce reliance on foreign technology in future conflicts.

AI Start-Up News.title: Maharashtra poised to lead Indiaâ€™s public-sector AI adoption: Wadhwani AI
AI Start-Up News.summary: Maharashtra is expected to take the lead in India's public-sector adoption of artificial intelligence, according to Wadhwani AI. The state is poised to leverage AI for various public services and governance. Wadhwani AI anticipates Maharashtra to set an example for other states to follow in AI adoption.
